title: My First Biome 雪封山脉
author: lablablabla
txt_content:
Releashing a new post of a 30 minutes` work. Using various audacious applications, I have created an astonishing world. The pictures shown below are *UN*modified screenshots taken with PC 1.7.10, shaders copyrighted Sonic Ether (v10.1). Sorry I only have a 1280*1024 screen, and the sqrt(2)x MSAA had already dropped my framerate to 3fps... :(
放出一个在一堆鲁莽的软件下30分钟的工作，地图的确很惊人。后图都是1.7.10,SEUS10.1照出的截图，只是sqrt(2)的抗锯齿把我的帧率害惨了。



    [url=][/url]

请不要做伸手党，回复是美德！

下载地址见上，提取密码asnp
